summary: This document is an email from August 12, 2019, regarding a chronological log for July 23-24, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein. It notes an administrative error where the wrong log book (a '1/M companion log') was used instead of the proper 'Staff Suicide Watch log' for Epstein, and that a second, corrected log was completed. The document includes an address for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the staff watch and suicide watch logs. Referenced by his inmate registration number 73618-054.

events.title: Epstein placed on staff/suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed under some form of staff watch, with logs being maintained for July 23-24, 2019.

events.title: Administrative error in log-keeping reported
events.description: An email is sent noting that the wrong log book (a '1/M companion log') was used for Epstein's watch instead of the proper 'Staff Suicide Watch log', and that a corrected log was completed.

locations: 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007 (Metropolitan Correctional Center)
keyFacts: The document concerns logs for Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration on July 23-24, 2019.
An administrative error occurred where the wrong type of log book ('1/M companion log') was used to record Epstein's watch status.
The correct log type should have been the 'Staff Suicide Watch log'.
A second, corrected log was completed using the proper Suicide Watch log book.
The document indicates institutional record-keeping procedures and potential confusion surrounding Epstein's monitoring.
